mapper.sql: select d.org_code, d.parent_org_code, d.ancestors, d.org_name, d.view_index, d.org_phone, d.org_address, d.org_status, d.scan_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from usr_org d
mapper.select: select d.org_code from usr_org d left join usr_role_Org rd on d.org_code = rd.org_code where rd.role_code = #{roleCode} and d.org_code not in (select d.parent_org_code from usr_org d inner join usr_role_Org rd on d.org_code = rd.org_code and rd.role_code = #{roleCode}) order by d.parent_org_code, d.view_index

select d.org_code, d.parent_org_code, d.ancestors, d.org_name, d.view_index, d.org_phone, d.org_address, d.org_status, (select org_name from usr_org where org_code = d.parent_org_code) parent_name from usr_org d where d.org_code = #{orgCode}
select count(1) from usr_users where org_code = #{orgCode} and scan_flag = '0'
select count(1) from usr_org where scan_flag = '0' and parent_org_code = #{orgCode} limit 1
select * from usr_org where find_in_set(#{orgCode}, ancestors)
select count(*) from usr_org where org_status = 0 and scan_flag = '0' and find_in_set(#{orgCode}, ancestors)
where org_name=#{orgName} and parent_org_code = #{parentOrgCode} and scan_flag = '0' limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into usr_org( org_code, parent_org_code, org_name, ancestors, view_index, org_phone, org_address, org_status, create_by, create_time )values( #{orgCode}, #{parentOrgCode}, #{orgName}, #{ancestors}, #{viewIndex}, #{orgPhone}, #{orgAddress}, #{orgStatus}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
